name: tamanu
description: This repo contains all the packages for Tamanu
author: Beyond Essential Systems Pty. Ltd.

scripts.lan-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace lan run test
scripts.lan-start-dev: yarn run build-shared && yarn run watch-shared-and lan start-dev
scripts.lan-migrate: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate up" yarn run lan-start-dev
scripts.lan-migrate-down: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate down" yarn run lan-start-dev
scripts.shared-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/shared run test
scripts.sync-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace sync-server run test
scripts.sync-shell: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace sync-server run shell
scripts.sync-start-dev: yarn run build-shared && yarn run watch-shared-and sync-server start-dev
scripts.sync-migrate: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate" yarn run sync-start-dev
scripts.sync-migrate-down: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate down" yarn run sync-start-dev
scripts.meta-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace meta-server run test
scripts.build-report: yarn build-shared && yarn workspace sync-server build && yarn workspace sync-server start report
